dataset_id: LIS/OTD 0.5 Degree High Resolution Monthly Climatology (HRMC) V2.3.2015
organizations: Global Hydrology Resource Center, Marshall Space Flight Center, NASA
title: LIS/OTD 0.5 Degree High Resolution Monthly Climatology (HRMC) V2.3.2015
summary: The LIS/OTD 0.5 Degree High Resolution Monthly Climatology (HRMC) contains a variety of gridded climatologies of total lightning flash rates obtained from two lightning detection sensors - the spaceborne Optical Transient Detector (OTD) on Orbview-1 and the Lightning Imaging Sensor (LIS) onboard the Tropical Rainfall Measuring Mission (TRMM) satellite. The long LIS (equatorward of about 38 degree) record makes the merged climatology most robust in the tropics and subtropics, while the high latitude data is entirely from OTD. The HRMC dataset include monthly flash rate climatology and flash rate seasonal climatology data on a 0.5 degree grid in HDF and netCDF-4 format.
